title: Діда мороза не буває
overview: Dana and Aleksandrs meet on New Year's Eve. Dana's spontaneous decision to adopt a child from an orphanage runs into an insurmountable bureaucratic wall.The only possible solution to the business problems of a citizen of Latvia Aleksandrs is to obtain a Ukrainian residence permit. A fictitious marriage is the best solution for both characters. However, there are detractors around Dana and around Aleksandrs trying to frustrate our characters' plans.
